billing_section_description: Address associated with the payment method
shipping_section_description: Location where the ordered items will be delivered

items.label: Items
items.delete_message: Are you sure you'd like to remove this item? You won't be able to bring it back.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.helper_text: Number of items in the cart.

subscription-frequency.label: Subscription frequency
subscription-frequency.helper_text: This determines how often this subscription will be processed. To modify this value for an existing subscription, you must modify the subscription directly.

subscription-start-date.label: Subscription start
subscription-start-date.helper_text: The original date this subscription began or will begin if set in the future. To modify this value for an existing subscription, you must modify the subscription directly.

subscription-end-date.label: Subscription end
subscription-end-date.helper_text: If set, the date this subscription will end. The subscription will not run on this day.

discount-name.label: Discount name
discount-name.helper_text: The name of the line item discount if it is included on this item.

expires.label: Expires
expires.helper_text: Date when this item will be removed from the cart (optional).

image.label: Image
image.helper_text: URL of the image to display for this item in the cart and checkout.

url.label: URL
url.helper_text: Full URL for the customer to view this item on the store website.

shipto.label: Shipping address
shipto.helper_text: Used for multiship to assign this item to a specific shipment.
shipto.placeholder: Select address to ship this item to...

width.label: Width
width.helper_text: This is currently a placeholder for future use.

height.label: Height
height.helper_text: This is currently a placeholder for future use.

length.label: Width
length.helper_text: This is currently a placeholder for future use.

weight.label: Weight
weight.helper_text: Per-item weight, used for shipping rate requests.

item-category-uri.label: Item category
item-category-uri.helper_text: Item category associated with this item.

code.label: Code
code.helper_text: Unique item code such as SKU or barcode.

parent-code.label: Parent code
parent-code.helper_text: Used if this should be a child product in a bundle.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this attribute from the item.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

name.label: Name
name.helper_text: Name of this attribute. It does not have to be unique.
name.v8n_too_long: Please choose a name that is 500 characters long or less.

value.label: Value
value.helper_text: Value of this attribute. Attribute values are automatically HTML-escaped.
value.v8n_required: Please provide a value for this attribute.
value.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we can't store values that are more than 1000 characters long.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.helper_text: Controls who can see this attribute. Public attributes can be shown to anyone, including customers. Private attributes are more suitable for configuration or technical details which are irrelevant to the public. Restricted attributes can only be viewed with the OAuth client that created them.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this attribute? You won't be able to bring it back.

item-options.title: Item options
item-options.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this item option from the item.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this item option? You won't be able to bring it back.
Are you sure you'd like to remove this item? You won't be able to bring it back.

applied-coupon-codes.label: Coupon codes
applied-coupon-codes.delete_message: Are you sure you'd like to remove this coupon code? This might affect the cart total.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

billing-first-name.label: First name
billing-first-name.v8n_too_long: We can't store first names that are more than 50 characters long. Please shorten this value.

billing-last-name.v8n_too_long: We can't store last names that are more than 50 characters long. Please shorten this value.
